text: The Experience was a German progressive thrash metal band from Saarlouis. It was formed in 1993 by Dirk Engelbert, Sascha Wilmes, Roman Biewer and Thomas Merschmann. == Members == === Final lineup === * Dirk Engelbert – bass * Tom Diener – drums * Sascha Wilmes – guitar * Roman Biewer – vocals, guitar === Former members === * Joe Reitz – bass * Thomas Merschmann – drums * Renate Iffland – flute * Christian Jost – keyboards == Discography == * Mental Solitude (demo; 1995) * Realusion (1996) * Insight (1999) * Cid: Reflections of a Blue Mind (2001) == References == Category:Musical groups established in 1993 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2001 Category:German thrash metal musical groups
title: The Experience (band)
